short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online Resources for Checking common Facts and Myths

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Facts and Myths extension connects you to top fact-checking websites.  In today's age of ubiquitous information, misconceptions abound and staying on top of the facts and be a challenge. The Facts and Myths extension puts quality fact-checking websites at its users fingertips.
